hadith.chapterTitle: Virtues of Knowledge which is Learnt and Taught for the sake of Allah
hadith.body:
Mu'awiyah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "When Allah wishes good for someone, He bestows upon him the understanding of Deen."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب فضل العلم تعلما وتعليما لله
hadith.body: - وعن معاوية رضي الله عنه قال‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏:‏ ‏"‏من يرد الله به خيرًا يفقه في الدين‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏
